title: Jeremiah is Saved by Micah's Prophecy
description:
Readings from:
Jeremiah 26: 1,4-6, 8-9.17-19
Today's passages were read by Mike Shelley. Mike accepted Christ when he was 10 years of age and has been in Christian radio for over 30 years.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
